${ModID}:HarvestBeans.NAME: Harvest Beans
${ModID}:HarvestBeans.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card you played this combat wasn't an attack, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:HarvestCarrots.NAME: Harvest Carrots
${ModID}:HarvestCarrots.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Repeat for each card type you've played this turn.

${ModID}:HarvestPotatoes.NAME: Harvest Potatoes
${ModID}:HarvestPotatoes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card you played this combat wasn't a skill, gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:HarvestRadishes.NAME: Harvest Radishes
${ModID}:HarvestRadishes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Weak for each card type you've played this turn.

${ModID}:OutToMarket.NAME: Out To Market
${ModID}:OutToMarket.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies the first time you play a card type each turn.

${ModID}:PestControl.NAME: Pest Control
${ModID}:PestControl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each card type you've played this turn.

${ModID}:SoilResiliency.NAME: Soil Resiliency
${ModID}:SoilResiliency.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL If you've played 3 or more card types this turn, add a copy to your discard pile.

${ModID}:SupplyChain.NAME: Supply Chain
${ModID}:SupplyChain.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Fertilizer to your hand at the start of each turn.
${ModID}:SupplyChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Add a *Fertilizer to your hand at the start of each turn.

${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.NAME: Sow The Seeds
${ModID}:SowTheSeeds.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Fertilizer to your hand. NL Put !M! cards with different types from your deck into your hand.

${ModID}:TillTheEarth.NAME: Till The Earth
${ModID}:TillTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a *Fertilizer to your hand.
